nodes.id: 中华人民共和国内务部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院已经撤消的组成部门，其主要职能后由中华人民共和国民政部承接。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, whose main functions were later taken over by the Ministry of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府内务部和中华人民共和国内务部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs for both the Central People's Government and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国内务部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国内务部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的中央政府部门，是中华人民共和国内务部的前身。
description.en: A central government department in the early days of the People's Republic of China, and the predecessor to the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the PRC.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国民政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，承接了原中华人民共和国内务部的部分主要职能。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which took over some of the main functions of the former Ministry of Internal Affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，即中央人民政府。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, i.e., the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, launched and led by Mao Zedong.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国公安工作的组成部门。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of nationwide public security work.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾主管农业与农村经济发展的组成部门。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that was in charge of agriculture and rural economic development.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农垦部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农垦部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国曾设立的负责国营农场和移民开垦事务的部门。
description.en: A former ministry of the People's Republic of China responsible for state farms and land reclamation by migrants.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾设立的负责人事工作的机构，后被撤销，工作并入内务部。
description.en: A former agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for personnel affairs, which was later abolished with its functions merged into the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国财政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管财政收支、财税政策等的组成部门。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of fiscal revenue and expenditure, fiscal and taxation policies, etc.

description.zh-cn: 服务于中国视力障碍和听力障碍人士的全国性社会团体。
description.en: A national social organization serving visually and hearing-impaired people in China.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一届全国人民代表大会，于1954年9月召开，会议通过了《中华人民共和国宪法》和《中华人民共和国国务院组织法》，并成立了中华人民共和国国务院。
description.en: The first National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, convened in September 1954, which passed the Constitution of the PRC and the Organic Law of the State Council, and established the State Council.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院第一办公室

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院第一办公室

description.zh-cn: 曾协助国务院总理掌管内务部等部门工作的国务院办事机构。
description.en: A former working body of the State Council that assisted the Premier in managing departments such as the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 谢觉哉担任中央人民政府内务部部长。
description.en: Xie Juezai served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 谢觉哉担任中华人民共和国内务部部长。
description.en: Xie Juezai served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 钱瑛担任中华人民共和国内务部部长。
description.en: Qian Ying served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 曾山担任中华人民共和国内务部部长。
description.en: Zeng Shan served as the Minister of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国内务部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国内务部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China was a constituent department of the State Council of the PRC.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月第一届全国人民代表大会召开后，原中央人民政府内务部改组为中华人民共和国内务部。
description.en: After the first National People's Congress was held in September 1954, the former Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Central People's Government was reorganized into the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命的背景下，中共中央于1968年12月批准撤销内务部，该部最终于1970年6月被正式撤销。
description.en: In the context of the Cultural Revolution, the CPC Central Committee approved the abolition of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in December 1968, and the ministry was formally abolished in June 1970.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国内务部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 内务部被撤销后，其部分职能由1978年新成立的民政部承接。
description.en: After the Ministry of Internal Affairs was abolished, some of its functions were taken over by the newly established Ministry of Civil Affairs in 1978.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国内务部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 1955年，内务部的户政工作划归中华人民共和国公安部管理。内务部撤销后，其行政区划工作于1972年3月也交由公安部负责。
description.en: In 1955, the household registration work of the Ministry of Internal Affairs was transferred to the Ministry of Public Security. After the Ministry of Internal Affairs was abolished, its administrative division work was also transferred to the Ministry of Public Security in March 1972.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国农业部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 1956年5月，原由农业部主管的国内移民工作交由内务部管理。
description.en: In May 1956, the responsibility for domestic migration, previously managed by the Ministry of Agriculture, was transferred to the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国内务部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农垦部

description.zh-cn: 1958年3月24日，内务部主管的国内移民工作划归中华人民共和国农垦部管理。
description.en: On March 24, 1958, the responsibility for domestic migration, managed by the Ministry of Internal Affairs, was transferred to the Ministry of State Farms and Land Reclamation.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 1959年6月20日，国务院人事局被撤销，其相关工作改由内务部管理。
description.en: On June 20, 1959, the State Council Personnel Bureau was abolished, and its related work was transferred to the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国内务部

description.zh-cn: 中国盲人聋哑人协会曾是中华人民共和国内务部的挂靠单位。
description.en: The China Association for the Blind and Deaf was once an affiliated unit of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国内务部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国财政部

description.zh-cn: 1972年3月，原属内务部负责的优抚、救济工作交由财政部负责。
description.en: In March 1972, the work of providing benefits to entitled groups and relief, previously under the Ministry of Internal Affairs, was transferred to the Ministry of Finance.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国内务部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院第一办公室

description.zh-cn: 在成立初期，中华人民共和国内务部的相关工作由国务院第一办公室协助国务院总理掌管。
description.en: In its early days, the work of the Ministry of Internal Affairs was managed by the First Office of the State Council, assisting the Premier.
